name: Tentacle Interrupt
description:
Tentacle Interrupt is a weird little game about chain reactions, floating cats, and a diminutive unseen abomination from another dimension.


Right click to pick up the Thing.

Left click to throw the Thing, hold to charge the Thing.

WASD to Move
Shift to sprint, Space to Jump
M to Mute / Unmute 

Hope you enjoy!

I have included a Windows standalone build if you prefer to download.
